sentences: Käskis mul minna oma nina toppima!
Ahaa! paras! – kes käskis minna oma nina toppima!
Nüüd ma mõistan, keegi käskis mind tegema seda.
context: The word 'käskis' is the past tense third person singular form of the verb 'käskima', which means to order or command someone to do something. It indicates that someone gave an instruction or directive in the past.
